names.Name: The golden smell of french fries being cooked
Smoking section, exotic tobacco scents like salmon and rubber
Fresh smell of flowers coming from thuribles Servants of the Mall add a clear chemical to periodically
Faint smell of burnt toast with no apparent source, phantosmia?
Delicious scent wafting from the garbage can
New baby smell coming from the kitchen of one of the restaurants
Large group seated together and praying in an unfamiliar language
White noise of numerous conversations hides a message for one of the PCs
Explosive customer screaming at a smug teenage sales clerk
Cacophony of songbirds perched above in the rafters
A monster slumbers in the middle of the food court, people order in whispers and eat in silence
Banshee wailing coming from underneath one of the tables
A forgotten combo meal toy rests near a puddle of ketchup
Unserviced, tables dotted with crumbs and ketchup spots, trash cans overflowing
Someone left behind a bag from a random store under the table
A complex playplace for children with tunnels and ballpits
An enormous taxidermized whale hangs over the food court
Birds swoop and fight viciously for any dropped food
A little trinket in a random PC's meal, like the baby in a king cake
The unpleasant grit of sand
Coppery taste coats the inside of random PC's mouth after sipping a fountain drink
A tiny bone in a dish that should have no bones in it
A random PC's food appears and smells normal but in their mouth has the texture of chewing plastic wrap
The subtle but insistent flavor of black licorice ruins a random PC's meal
Grease from a random PC's order won't wash off, leaving them with slippery hands
For a random PC, every chair seems to have a sticky seat
Wading through discarded wrappers and leftover food in anklehigh heaps
Great waves of heat from bonfires that light this medieval styled food court
Instead of napkins, invisible dogs lick the faces and hands of diners
Unsupervised children roughhousing and making a mess bump into random PC, spilling their tray
